verses.name: Proverbs 28:25
verses.text: He that is of a proud heart stirreth up strife: but he that putteth his trust in the Lord shall be made fat.

verses.name: Proverbs 28:26
verses.text: He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool: but whoso walketh wisely, he shall be delivered.

verses.name: Proverbs 28:27
verses.text: He that giveth unto the poor shall not lack: but he that hideth his eyes shall have many a curse.

verses.name: Proverbs 28:28
verses.text: When the wicked rise, men hide themselves: but when they perish, the righteous increase.
